short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension developed for pilots to submit fligt request automatically at Flica.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An application dedicated to US pilots that will assist them by automatically searching for an open-time at Flica portal and submit an instant request. This will save their time and effort and ensure a submission of available open time slot.
